snippet: Lawmakers must demand the fullest accounting of a recruiting program that paid cash bounties for drawing thousands of enlistees into service.
abstract: Editorial calls on lawmakers to demand a full accounting of fraud related to Army recruiting program that paid cash bounties for drawing thousands of enlistees into service during the Iraq and Afghanistan wars.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers must demand the fullest accounting of a recruiting program that paid cash bounties for drawing thousands of enlistees into service.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
